DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate tolerability safety single intravenous infusion ACZ885 . It also explore efficacy compound central macular edema visual acuity patient wet age-related macular edema .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Intravenous Infusion ACZ885 Patients With Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration
